## Article Content

GETTING STARTED
MANGOMINT BASICS
Learning the Basics in Mangomint
IN THIS ARTICLE
Navigating the platform
Learning the basics as a staff member
Additional resources

This article can help you learn the basics of Mangomint, and you can also visit our Video Library to watch on-demand videos and learn about different Mangomint features in detail.

Link copied
Navigating the platform

Use the main menu to switch between different apps in Mangomint. Select Apps to view all your apps. Depending on your permissions, you may not have access to certain apps.

If you are an Admin user, you can select Manage apps to manage your apps and integrations.

Link copied
Learning the basics as a staff member

If you are a staff member (including service providers and non-Admin users), our Staff Member Basics video is available to help you learn the basics of your Mangomint account, including:

Navigating the calendar

Creating appointments

Adding clients

Link copied
